common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Retrieve all products currently in the Open Campaign, including campaign status, commission rate, and promotion period

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Invalid cursor. The cursor of first page is not passed or blank string, and subsequent pages are passed to the cursor in the response.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: item_id_list is blank or exceeded max limit.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have access to AMS features.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Please agree to the AMS T&C in Seller Center - Affiliate Marketing Solutions first before using Open API.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: The seller commission operation is frozen.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the \"page_size\" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single \"page\" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

","name":"page_size","sample":"20","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"cQwMQZe"},{"description":"

Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is \"\" or not passed. If data is more than one page, the cursor can be some entry to start next call.

","name":"cursor","sample":"1234,5678","type":"string","required":"False","key":"ZMHFhXb"},{"description":"

Use this field to specify which field to use to sort the returned item list. Sort by update_time and commission_id in descending order by default. Available values:

commission_rate: Sort by commission_rate in ascending order

-commission_rate: Sort by commission_rate in descending order

","name":"sort_by","sample":"commission_rate","type":"string","required":"False","key":"TQxdmC"},{"description":"

Search type: ITEM_NAME or ITEM_ID

","name":"search_type","sample":"ITEM_NAME","type":"string","required":"False","key":"SPkQxJb"},{"description":"

Search for item_name or item_id, item_id should be split by comma and at most 50 items.

","name":"search_content","sample":"test","type":"string","required":"False","key":"NnmZGJ"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"error_business","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"JbpmGCP"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Please agree to the AMS T&C in Seller Center - Affiliate Marketing Solutions first before using Open API.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"azczjtb"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","type":"string","required":null,"key":"XQGnxzz"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"RbBYDR","children":[{"description":"","name":"item_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"xJQWtSY","children":[{"description":"

Item ID

","name":"item_id","sample":"123","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"BGGkEmA"},{"description":"

Item Name

","name":"item_name","sample":"test","type":"string","required":null,"key":"KwcHFca"},{"description":"

Campaign ID

","name":"campaign_id","sample":"123","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"YdjcxzF"},{"description":"

Campaign Status: 

Upcoming

Ongoing

Terminating

","name":"campaign_status","sample":"Ongoing","type":"string","required":null,"key":"QXcehiH"},{"description":"

Commission Rate, 1.1 means 1.1%, support two decimal places

","name":"commission_rate","sample":"1.11","type":"float","required":null,"key":"GjahKNW"},{"description":"

Period Start Time

","name":"period_start_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"XbXbRyX"},{"description":"

Period End Time, if get 32503651199 (2999-12-31 23:59:59), it means no limit

","name":"period_end_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"bDdWPmm"},{"description":"

Pending Terminated Time

","name":"pending_terminated_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"cSajFH"},{"description":"

Commission Protection List

","name":"commission_protection_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"HxjRwBk","children":[{"description":"

Commission Rate, 1.1 means 1.1%, support two decimal places

","name":"commission_rate","sample":"1.21","type":"float","required":null,"key":"wPTCnpn"},{"description":"

Protection Period End Time

","name":"protection_period_end_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"meTHRMa"}]},{"description":"

Max Commission Rate Current Day, 1.1 means 1.1%, support two decimal places

","name":"max_commission_rate_current_day","sample":"1.21","type":"float","required":null,"key":"anNeQF"}]},{"description":"

Total number of items that match the condition

","name":"total_count","sample":"1000","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"hFEMWfm"},{"description":"

Pass the content in the next request as cursor to get the next page data

","name":"cursor","sample":"1234,5678","type":"string","required":null,"key":"Crpznpx"},{"description":"

This is to indicate whether the item list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve orders.

","name":"has_more","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"yjKcNEH"}]}]}
